column4: Hi, problem: trying to connect to the net in a hotel. iwlist eth0 scan finds the AP, but I can not connect to it; with windows, it works right away. I tried iwconfig eth0 essid <the name>, ifdown eth0, ifup eth0 and still no IP; what can I try?
anyone can help with a wireless problem?
did you try from the network manager/
no, its nothing like that. Look, you are a hotel, right? Is it a public wifi network?
